headline: General Dynamics (NYSE:GD) Surges 11% Over the Past Week
summary: General Dynamics (NYSE:GD) experienced a noteworthy 10.7% increase in its share price over the past week. This substantial movement aligns with the broader market trend, which saw a 5.4% rise in the same period. With the market also showing positive momentum over the last 12 months and anticipating a 14% annual earnings growth, General Dynamics’ performance reflects investor optimism. Any firm-specific news from this period could have added to the positive sentiment but would have been...
